nodes.text: Yoda's Guide to the Galaxy was a book written by the Jedi Master Yoda during his exile on Dagobah.

Yoda's Guide to the Galaxy was first mentioned in the 2021 non-canon reference book LEGO Star Wars Yoda's Galaxy Atlas. The idea that Yoda traveled the galaxy and commented on his findings dates back to LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles, another non-canon work from 2013 accompanying the series of the same name.
